data.comment: The big names in today's match at VEB Arena have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
CSKA Moscow are coming forward and Igor Diveev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tambov in the half of CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 7, Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Tambov.
In the minute 9, Tambov needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Moscow.
In the minute 10, Vladimir Moskalev awards Tambov a goal kick.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
CSKA Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Tambov in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
CSKA Moscow are whistled for offside.
In the minute 16, Free kick Tambov.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
In the minute 18, CSKA Moscow's Konstantin Kuchaev gets in a shot on goal at VEB Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
In the minute 19, Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick CSKA Moscow.
Arnor Sigurdsson's header is off-target for CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 22, Tambov have a goal kick.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Tambov's area.
Konstantin Kuchaev for CSKA Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Tambov at VEB Arena.
CSKA Moscow are pushing forward but Alan Dzagoev's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 28, Vladimir Moskalev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Ilia Shkurin is on a sub for Alan Dzagoev for CSKA Moscow.
Goal! Konstantin Kuchaev gives CSKA Moscow a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 29, Great play from Arnor Sigurdsson to set up the goal.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Vladimir Moskalev awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, In Moscow, CSKA Moscow push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Tambov just outside CSKA Moscow's area.
In the minute 42, Goal! Tambov draw level to 1-1 through a Aleksandre Karapetian header.
That's a fine assist from Pavel Karasev.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of CSKA Moscow.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Goal kick for Tambov at VEB Arena.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Throw-in for Tambov at VEB Arena.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 50, Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
Kirill Panchenko of Tambov smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Tambov to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Tambov.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tambov's half?
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, Goal! Ilia Shkurin heads CSKA Moscow into a 2-1 lead.
Vladimir Obukhov is replacing Kirill Panchenko for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In the minute 60, CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tambov pushes forward through Aleksandre Karapetian, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 63, The home team replace Arnor Sigurdsson with Adolfo Gaich.
Anton Kilin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tambov.
CSKA Moscow make their third substitution with Hordur Magnusson replacing Vadim Karpov.
In the minute 65, Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
In the minute 66, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for Tambov, close to CSKA Moscow's area.
In the minute 69, Tambov have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow push forward at VEB Arena and Konstantin Maradishvili gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tambov defence.
In the minute 71, CSKA Moscow drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
In the minute 73, Tambov will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from CSKA Moscow.
Ivan Oblyakov of CSKA Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Tambov a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Aleksandre Karapetian (Tambov) has received a yellow card from Vladimir Moskalev.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 78, Oleksandr Kaplienko is replacing Mikhail Kostyukov for Tambov at VEB Arena.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
In the minute 83, In Moscow CSKA Moscow attack through Hordur Magnusson. The finish is off target, however.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Tambov a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Aleksey Rybin with Evgeni Shlyakov. This is the third substitution made today by Sergey Pervushin.
In the minute 83, Tambov make their fourth substitution with Vitali Balashov replacing Anton Kilin.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladimir Obukhov for Tambov drives towards goal at VEB Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Can Tambov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside CSKA Moscow's half?
Tambov have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 88, Viktor Goncharenko is making the team's fourth substitution at VEB Arena with Jaka Bijol replacing Ilia Shkurin.
Throw-in for Tambov at VEB Arena.
Viktor Goncharenko (CSKA Moscow) is making a fifth substitution, with Nayair Tiknizyan replacing Konstantin Kuchaev.
Tambov's Vitali Balashov breaks free at VEB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
At VEB Arena the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
Tambov's Adessoye Oyewole gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Tambov needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Igor Akinfeev (CSKA Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
